website_summaries.verdict: The wall-mounted design saves space, though it does require more installation time and effort.
pros: Despite the small size, this infrared heater pumps out plenty of heat for cold weather with its 1,500-watt output
Includes a built-in timer, an LCD screen, and a remote control
cons: The short cord limits placement, and the heater itself is very bright

customer_reviews.title: This little guy is HOT!
customer_reviews.text: Just got a chance to test this heater out with chilling temperature in Chicago, I’m pretty surprise how well it performs giving it’s small size. It keeps me warm even I’m 5 feet away outdoor. I don’t recommend placing it like the way I have it on the picture, as the housing gets really hot and you might accidentally knock it off and cause unwanted damage. I would either mount it on the wall with nothing around it or get one of their heat stand.
customer_reviews.author: Ava C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: On high it’s not enough to warm my porch and I live in Houston it’s only 50 tonight. Will definitely return. Huge disappointment! Had great reviews, not sure why?! Have a covered porch that is only 6x10 and when sitting on it don’t feel the heat on high.Have had better results from smaller and cheaper heaters, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: JodyThompson

customer_reviews.title: Good heat, but didn't work es expected after a week of use
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about a week, but then the unit would not turn off with the remote - only by turning off the switch or unplugging. Returned it as I didn't feel it was safe to use this way.
customer_reviews.author: TTOMM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There were so many restrictions on where to put it ,the cord is to short.i never mounted it after reading instructions.i returned it
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this! Dont waste of your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 of these last week. After installation, Day 1, 2 out of 5 not working with remote control I need to turn on and off manually with the switch on the side. Other two always stay on high, cant lower the level. Only 1 working fine so far (Used 3days). I Paid to electrician more than thousand dollars to put electricity every rooms because it needs very high voltage 1400w per unit. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for the cost
customer_reviews.text: So the heater itself seems well constructed. Has 9 heat settings the highest of which throws a good amount of heat. It is used in an uninsulated area with 20' ceilings so it's strictly to throw some heat on a small work area. Works pretty well for this application. Cons- the mounting bracket is very flimsy, kind of surprising as the heater unit is quite sturdy. It works. The remote is really cheaply made, and is the only means to change temp. Really concerned that the remote will not survive long or will be misplaced. Heater is almost useless without the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Solid heater
customer_reviews.text: My propane heater stopped working in my garage and I needed something that I can use when needed. I have always seen these type of heaters on patios of restaurants so I wanted to try. It was easy to install and just had to plug it in. It works well and generates good heat. I will probably get another for my garage as I don't feel this one is big enough to warm th entire thing. I will say that I have been happy with the purchase and it keeps the area I'm working on nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence G

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months- Seller immediately replaced at no cost so am appreciative.
customer_reviews.text: Update to earlier review: Seller replaced at no cost/no questions. I really appreciate seller's (Trustech) proactive approach and am cautiously optimistic that this time there will be no problems. If heater doesn't break then I would definitely rate this 4+ and will again amend review. Gave it a 3 since jury is still out. Earlier review: Bought this heater in November for a screened in porch that has been winterized with vinyl over the windows. It broke after two months. Heater was mainly used in the evenings and turned off when not in use. Plus we have had a mild winter thus far. Very disappointed. Will be contacting seller and will report back on outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly big enough to heat an outside area
customer_reviews.text: Just not big enough to heat a covered patio area that is partially open to the elements. I expected more output and range from it when i bought it but once I saw it I knew the size wouldn't work. I tried and I was right, little to no heat from about 6 feet away. Definitely not enough to keep you warm or take the chill off. I ended up giving it to my in laws who have a small work area they wanted to heat in the garage. They seem to think its ok so far.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater if you don't care about what temperature you want to heat the room.
customer_reviews.text: This is the dumbest heater ever. Your temperature selections are F1 through F9. Would have killed someone to identify a F1 temperature or a F9 temperature and used a thermal sensor to shut off the heat? Best I can guess this heater is either on or off regardless of its surrounding temperature. I searched for green house heater and this POS came up with good reviews. But when the greenhouse temperature is in the 90s I sure don't need the f'ing heater on.
customer_reviews.author: Tony the Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing heat and jarring orange glare
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed in the heat output. Our standalone propane heater did a much better job. Cheap screws, made it hard to install, the head broke off one of the screws during installation. Made it impossible to fit the bracket flush against the wooden beam of our deck. So it’s slightly wonky. Sigh. Beware the infrared! At night, it lights up our porch with the most insanely bright orange glare, feels artificial and jarring. Not pleasant to hang out under with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Adams

customer_reviews.title: Only good for 6 to 8 ft away
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect this to act as a commercial outdoor unit. This does fine if you're less than 8 feet away on a patio and directly in front of the unit, but will not heat a very big area. Be very careful to mount this out of the reach of kids as the heater itself get VERY hot. The unit I received also does not show the temperature and look different than the units shown above. I wouldn't recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RePatriate

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with Ease
customer_reviews.text: Heater arrived promptly & we were able to mount it today. It's very easy to mount and heats the area nicely. We've installed it in our RV garage which doubles as a party barn. We are expecting the weather temperature to drop significantly this coming week. We'll test the area where we installed it for comfort and determine if we need to purchase 1 or 2 more. Very happy with purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: FNG Images

customer_reviews.title: Hot hot hot
customer_reviews.text: Puts out a lot of heat for its size, definitely have to mount this thing on the wall! I tested it on my workbench on max heat because I bought this for my garage and it burnt my bench! *****Update had this on high and ran some other things at the same time. Tripped the breaker now the heater is stuck on high. Tried unplugging it for a week, plug it in and flip the switch to on, display thinks it's off but heater is on high..
customer_reviews.author: Moody

customer_reviews.title: Nice hot heater
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to heat up her rain patio for cold fall and winter nights. We love being on our covered back porch and wanted a heater so that we could stay warm and listen enjoy the falling rain during Seattle fall and winters. I havent actually installed the heater yet (Christmas gift for my wife) but after plugging in the heater for testing it was immediately clear that this small heater put out a ton of heat! It heated really quickly and I could feel the heat 5-6 feet from the heater. I look forward to installing and using it!
customer_reviews.author: Warm in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Works well for MAYBE 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: On my 2nd one that has now stopped working properly. After about 2 months of use, the units could no longer be turned off with the remote or using the timer. You either have to flip the toggle switch or unplug it to shut it off. All the other functions (temperature adjustments, etc) work fine though. That's a MAJOR safety issue in my book!
customer_reviews.author: John Koelle

customer_reviews.title: Love this heater!
customer_reviews.text: Heats instantly, has nice range of heat settings, heats large space, super quiet, casts a nice glow, feels like being in Arizona! Really like that the heater can be wall mounted or used on the stand (sold separately for this heater and love it too) to use indoor or out. Really enjoy the comfort of this heater. The only con to this heater is that you must use the remote control to operate it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Seems great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t been able to use this much yet, however, I love the compact size and everyone is right about it taking seconds to heat up. Just be smart and take off the foam packing piece! (I wasn’t but caught on quick that it needed removed). Hope it lasts, we are having a frigid desert winter!
customer_reviews.author: luvtocooknread

customer_reviews.title: Not effective for patio or open space on cold or windy days
customer_reviews.text: Warm if you’re directly in front of it with no wind so don’t expect It to heat more than 1 person at a time unless you are sitting on someone’s lap. Put two or more on the circuit and you’ll probably blow a breaker. Best used in a closed area like a garage and if you are stationary.
customer_reviews.author: tank

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a covered patio that is enclosed on three sides. Provides more convenience then attempting to use propane heaters. Like any outdoor heater it Makes chilly evenings about 50 pleasant, once it gets in the 30s or 40s it’s just time to go inside. Overall a good value for the money. Very easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Jlenhart

customer_reviews.title: Small for that money
customer_reviews.text: Dry small and not powerful for this money, expensive. It’s maybe Very good for bathroom. But still expensive
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Just received this Heater and it works great. Puts out pots of heat and no noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Warm for small size
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small electric heater for a small patio in a condo. We can sit outside with several guests and all stay toasty warm. Our balcony is about 6 ft deep by 12 ft wide and with the heater in the middle we are all warm. We are not allowed to use propane in a condo and this electric model is much easier than propane anyway. You do need to have access to a nearby electrical outlet or an extension cord as the cord is only 6 ft long. It heats up very fast and the timer is nice for when we leave young adult children on the balcony and can't be sure they will turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product!
customer_reviews.text: Service was great, 1st one blew out after a couple of hours, I called them, they sent another one the same day and it’s been working great for over month now, great heat on our outside covered patio. Well worth it !
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bay

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I received this heater as a gift for Christmas for my patio outside and I love it! It works very fast and isn’t loud. It is perfect for my size area and it doesn’t smell. With it being an outdoor heater there was slight hesitation as to whether it will smell like gas or something burning, but the smell was very minimal. It is also very quiet! I got my patio built and screened to relax outside and the heater enables me to continue to relax and enjoy being outdoors even in the colder months. I highly recommend and would buy this for myself if I ever need to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Works well.....and is backed with Service!
customer_reviews.text: Heater is very high quality with exceptional heat output and easy to install....however in less than 30days....heater just stayed on! Unit switch and remote stopped working. Just received new replacement.....no hassle replacement....good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Wozab Sr

customer_reviews.title: Great little and versatile heater
customer_reviews.text: I was in search of an outdoor heater to help my dogs, and us, keep warm in the evenings. This appeared to do the trick and is just as described. It's very quick to heat up and is quiet, which is very important for my intended use as one of my dogs is very weary of strange noises. I leave it on overnight for them and use the timer to turn it off automatically at a certain time. I've tried a couple of other heaters and this is the best so far at this price point if you want a quiet, efficient heater.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Does well for its size
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought me this heater for Christmas for use on our screened-in porch. While it's never going to heat a large area in an outdoor space, it is very good at heating up the area around our outdoor sofa just enough to make it comfortable on a crisp evening. I like how the outer housing stays cool, and the remote works very well. The bulb that produces the heat is very bright on the highest setting, so be aware of that. It's not the biggest or strongest, but for the price, we are pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dshack

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this heater would help keep me warm while at the bbq in the winter months. Unfortunately, you can barely feel any heat even if you hold your hand closer to it. I would have considered a second one if it worked but unfortunately it doesnt produce any notable heat.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan O

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: it is compact, size is as necessary small, box is aluminum. It looks great. Heat is quick. I bought it for one of my bathrooms and probably I will add it to my other bathrooms as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Progovac

customer_reviews.title: Works in garage
customer_reviews.text: I was needing a space heater to heat my two car garage, I bought one and it wasn't enough. I got this one and it is keeping my garage at 45 degrees in 16 degree temperatures outside. I do not have it set at the highest setting either. I am very happy with this purchase. I highly recommend this heater.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Turns off every 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Heat was decent while it worked but 2 days after the return window closed it began to turn off by itself after 5 minutes (no sign of overheating) and the remote no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: useful if it stays on
customer_reviews.text: First forget about installing this outdoors... it just does not have the heat you need. much less heating area than a standing gas version. the particular unit I had did not stay on beyond 5-10 mins. it would turn off... I checked make sure that the power supply is working. Something wrong with the unit. had to return in. On the positive, it looked great and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Randv

customer_reviews.title: "SMALL BUT MIGHTY"
customer_reviews.text: I needed a heater that would heat my area fast. This heater ended up being the product I was looking for. It is "SMALL BUT MIGHTY." I Couldn't believe the amount of heat it put out when I first turned the unit on. It was amazing! I would definitely recommend this heater to anyone wanting to heat an area in a matter of minutes. Another feature that I liked was the ease of mounting the unit, due to the weight and size of this unit. "SMALL BUT MIGHTY"
customer_reviews.author: Mona Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Geater heater in my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: The heater arrived in a great condition with fully covered. It is easy to assemble. The house's central heating is not super good in my bedroom so I bought this to make me warmer in the winter. The heater works perfectly now in my bedroom and makes me not suffer the cold in the winter. I am able to remote control the heater on my bed if I feel too warm or a little cold. I will definitely give it a 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Sheng Wang

customer_reviews.title: Surprising amount of heat
customer_reviews.text: I installed this electric heater under an awning on my patio and my wife and I love it. It gets super warm for those nights when it cools down but you're not done hanging out outside yet, and it's so nice to just click a remote without having to worry about refilling expensive propane tanks. This heater is so great that I bought a second one for my parents who live near the beach and love to sit outside but won't do it in the evenings due to the cool sea breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Bindu Naran

customer_reviews.title: Great heater and even better customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Was given this heater for Christmas. Worked well right out of the box and perfect for chilly nights on the back porch with a cigar and scotch. My dog buddy ended up enjoying the remote a little too much and took it away never to be found. Messsaged the seller asking for a way to purchase a replacement remote and within 10 minutes received a reply asking me for my shipping address to send a replacement....no questions asked....no charge. Received 3 days later. That is customer works.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: This heater is small; but, works big!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this heater. I hung it up in my shed for my two dogs. I live in Sacramento and it gets kinda chilly at night in November. This thing heated up my shed with a nice evenly heat. The whole place feel warm no matter where you stand. Unlike other that requires you to always be in front of it to feel the heat. The only thing is that the cord could have been a bit longer. Don’t think too much! This heater is worth the money. Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: jerry duong

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Quality heater. Heats up my small one car garage to about 50 degrees (Fahrenheit).I did insulate my garage this fall.but the temp. outside is in the 20s.I know 50 isnt warm.but its warm enough to work on my Jeep. Maybe I shouldn't buy Jeeps then I wouldn't be in the garage in the middle of winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lonitro

customer_reviews.title: Horrible six inch Heater
customer_reviews.text: Awful Product. Heat is extreme for about a six inch wave, as opposed to a wider spread area as advertised. Poorly made, and burnt a hole in my patio carpet due to the narrow concentrated heat.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Short Life - Poor Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Great heat but I've had two break the exact same way. It gets stuck on the highest setting and the remote no longer controls the unit. Both with minimal use. Sad but true.
customer_reviews.author: Greg H

customer_reviews.title: Ok heater
customer_reviews.text: We bought this little heater for the patio. Was shipped on time. Installation was very easy. Worked as described. Remote control a little cheap but works ok.
customer_reviews.author: SicFlix

customer_reviews.title: Small but stronger heat than i imagined
customer_reviews.text: I first did not care for the size being small while thinking it wouldn't produce enough heat.....boy o boy was i wrong. It is plenty hot enough and the remote control makes it easy to adjust temp. My wife likes the color since it matches close to our house facscia boards. I highly recommend this patio or garage heater and its so lightweight that its easy to install or move around.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Stillman

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality. It has a remote and different levels of heat. It just works!
customer_reviews.text: We needed some way to stay warm in the winter months on our screened in porch. The porch is just screen so space heaters are ok but wind blows and unless your really bundled up, no go. The porch just stays empty until spring. We bought this heater skeptical because of the great price level. It works GREAT. You can’t go wrong. My son is now going to buy one for his patio.
customer_reviews.author: paul d furr

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater for what I paid.  Lightweight.  Direct heat.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. I hung it above a table on a covered patio and it provided plenty of heat. The patio is an extension of garage with a cover and 3 open sides. If it's 40 degrees and it's pointing towards you about 4 feet away on high you get pretty warm. Definitely less expensive than my tall propane heater.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Radcliffe

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my garage
customer_reviews.text: I installed this heater in my single car detached garage and its great. I can continue to work in my garage down to about 40 degrees and still be comfortable. It was pretty easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Costa

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This little guy puts out a lot of heat! We have it hanging on the wall in our outside patio and I'm amazed at the amount of warmth it puts out. The remote control is especially helpful since we have it mounted up high.
customer_reviews.author: Shredder

customer_reviews.title: Great heater.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great electrical heater. We are using it in our smaller shed to keep the two outdoor cats warm. This, along with their little cat house, has made them snuggly warm. I would recommend for anyone not wanting the hassle and danger of using propane.
customer_reviews.author: B. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Heats up very fast!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great outdoor heater. I'm usually too cold to hang out on my deck most nights of the year. This heater instantly creates a warm space so that now I can eat dinner and have friend over in the evening. The glass in the front is very fragile so be careful. Remote works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: M. Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Patio Heater
customer_reviews.text: This patio heater arrived quickly. It was a bit smaller than I expected but the heat output is very impressive! It’s quiet and the remote is so convenient. We look forward to sitting on the patio even when it’s cool outside because the heater will keep us warm and comfortable - allowing us to enjoy more time outside in the evening. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Craig T.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this to warm up the area in my garage gym before I start working out and it's good for about a 10' x 10' area. Takes about 30 secs to really feel it's heat when it's real cold unless you're standing right in front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Used every day for the past six months, still runs great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I keep my dogs in my garage when I am at work, but in the winter it can get really cold! I mounted this above their beds and it has worked amazingly! I love that there are two heat functions to choose from. I definitely recommend using this product to hear small areas (i.e. garages, patios, sheds, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Heat output is very good for its size. We have a small outdoor patio and it helps a lot in cool and cold temperatures (30 degrees F and below, not so much). The remote control needs to be fairly close to the unit to work, but it works! It's a fair price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really warm anymore than 4 sq feet so literally you have to stand under it to feel the heat
customer_reviews.author: sayers

customer_reviews.title: Work bench heater
customer_reviews.text: I don’t heat my garage all the time so have this heater above my work bench and it does an awesome job keeping me warm while I work on a project that I don’t want to heat my entire garage for. The heat output is adjustable with the easy to use remote and this unit packs a lot of heat in a smaller package. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fern

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised but, BEWARE, if you lose or break the remote there is absolutely no way to turn this thing on... my remote broke and now the heater is... just... there... Customer service is just a guy answering a phone... then will text you an email address... seems shady to me
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Muzzillo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work. Sent a previously returned item to us.
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to order this product based on reviews. Item #1 didn’t heat when plugged in. Returned item. Item #2 arrived in a clearly reused box and did not include any padding on the inside. This item also did not heat. Returned item. Clearly will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly A Miller

customer_reviews.title: Instant Hot
customer_reviews.text: The two heaters are installed in the ceiling of an enclosed carport. The heaters heat up fast and warms up the area. We like them because they heat objects instead of the air. There is no noise when they are on, which is great. The remote control makes it easy to turn off, on, or adjust the units as you don't have to reach up.
customer_reviews.author: sandra guyot

customer_reviews.title: Heat for a small space
customer_reviews.text: The overall size is perfect for making your space comfortable in the chilly breeze while not being in the way. The remote is easy to operate with an easy to use design. The cord length is good at at approximately 6ft in length, I always think cords are to short no matter the length so that is my only negative thing to say, even though it isn’t really negative. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Heat output
customer_reviews.text: We just love this heater, have tried others to keep our back screened in porch warm in the winter so that we could still enjoy sitting out there, none came close to being able to heat the area, but this heater kept the whole area which is about 250sq ft toasty warm!!! Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, the heater doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: First one stopped turning off via the remote. I exchanged it for a new one and the same thing happened. Only this time it’s outside the return window. The heat is fine/as expected, but the quality is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will be very warm
customer_reviews.text: This heating room will be very warm this winter. It is also very convenient to hang on the wall. There is a lot of space. I have a lot of remote control.
customer_reviews.author: qinlinchen

customer_reviews.title: Good portable heater
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heater to keep us warm in the family room during the evening. It had multiple good reviews so I had high expectations and it did not disappoint me. It heats up within seconds and having a remote (with 9 level of heat level) really helps to control overall temperature of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Rachana N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Chilly Nights
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these heaters for my back patio and they heat the entire seating area perfectly. The remote control responds quickly and accurately. I love how fast they turn on and off. I highly recommend this product for chilly nights. All my guests ask where I got them!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Duran

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your time
customer_reviews.text: Worked for one night and never turned back on. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: david Fakhoury

customer_reviews.title: I love this heater
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heater and I absolutely love it. I puts off great heat on my patio. I was used to a propane heater, but this one works just as good. I would definitely recommend this product if you like being outside in the winter months. Great product for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Klause

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: This thing is hot! We intended to hang the heater from a wooden beam, but because it’s so hot to touch, we felt like this would be unsafe. We’re ordering the pole mount so it can stand instead of hang. And don’t let the small size fool you, this thing can emit some heat!
customer_reviews.author: BBE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: although this heater was not good for me, the company customer service was amazing!! I would definitely buy the brand again because of that!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t serve my purpose
customer_reviews.text: Lots of reviews indicated it warmed their garages. I’m guessing that it might during fall or spring evenings. Not for Michigan winters.
customer_reviews.author: E. Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for less than a week before it wouldn't turn off. I had to unplug the unit completely to get it to shut off. I ended up returning it and buying a different unit completely.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Powerful patio heater
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful heater. Super easy to install, plug and set.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor heater
customer_reviews.text: It heats up fast and gives a good amount of heat, even if use outside. I use it for my dogs outside.
customer_reviews.author: JESUS HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: This TRUSTECH heater definitely delivers the heat.
customer_reviews.text: As a knife maker working out of my garage, heat and staying warm is a must and the TRUSTECH heater is perfect. Very fast heat delivery and good area coverage. Definitely worth the money. Only regret is not getting it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Natano

customer_reviews.title: Not enough heat
customer_reviews.text: It just really doesn't put out that much heat! You either need to sit directly under it or possibly need 3 or 4 of them
customer_reviews.author: christina anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly until it didn’t!!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective for about a week then it just flat out stopped working!! Customer service contacted me within one day and sent a replacement immediately! Very happy with their response!!
customer_reviews.author: Jslo

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: Really great little heater so far! It heats up REALLY quickly and I have not had one issue thus far and am very happy with my purchase. Will update my review if any issues arrise in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Will V

customer_reviews.title: Heater review
customer_reviews.text: For the porch area was not good to cold for mo closer in the area. In a closed area would be good
customer_reviews.author: maria pfender

customer_reviews.title: Amazing heater!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing heater and super hot! Exactly what I was looking for to use in my garage during the winter! I actually ordered a second because it was so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Park

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We used this in our sunroom that we recently put a hot tub in. The room isn't heated and gets quite cold. I was surprised how quickly and evenly this small heated warmed the room. The remote is convenient and the heated is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Jim A Ference

customer_reviews.title: Warm, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Supplies an ample amount of heat on our front porch. Knocks the chill right off. The assembly was simple and the remote control eases access to the warmth. Highly recommend the Trustech heater!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Power

customer_reviews.title: The heater is very small. Photos on Amazon are deceiving.  It has a very low heat output.
customer_reviews.text: The heater is very small and the photos on Amazon are deceiving. You have to stand within 2-3 feet of the heater to feel it. The plug is short and the images show it mounted high on the wall. You would have to have an outlet installed for the heater.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Size in photos are deceiving. Small unit.
customer_reviews.text: I wish you would let people know the actual size rather then making it look like a larger unit in your advertisement photos. I find that to be deceiving. This is a $50.00 heater at most. Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice but not effective
customer_reviews.text: although I liked that I can attach on wall or ceiling, the heat output wasn't impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Lileana

customer_reviews.title: Love this heater
customer_reviews.text: Love this heater. Easy setup Heats up fast. Warms my garage quickly. All metal which is hard to find now. Quality product. Amazing customer service I misplaced the remote, contact the company and with in days received a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product form TrustTech
customer_reviews.text: Great heat output for a compact unit. Infrared warms objects not the air around making it much more efficient. I use it in my patio to keep guest and my dogs warm. I live in Florida so our winters don't last that long
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Great Lil Heater
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom for her outdoor bar area. I was surprised how much heat this puts out for exercise. She doesn’t even have to put it on high she runs it at the 750 W setting. Nice heater well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Darren A.

customer_reviews.title: Low heat
customer_reviews.text: Did not hear beyond a few feet on the patio
customer_reviews.author: Sudi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Remote control has to be a foot from sensor . Doesn’t give out allot of heat. Not a good purchase IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin S. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Glad bought this item,enjoy my warm close patio right in time。Has a remote control with different heat settings. Very easy to install,only take me less than10 minutes。 This heater literally has useful feature I was looking for and the function works fine。
customer_reviews.author: wai

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought few. One came already broke. Got a replacement. Perfect size. Looks great in my space. But remote broke right away. Had it little over 2 months and it’s already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Biya RAMAR

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Heater works great. Is quite a bit smaller than I expected but still puts out good heat. Got it for the dogs on the back porch amd the Great Dane is scared to death of it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Not enough heat to warm up my Living room. 12x16 room inside. Very expensive price. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Alan Echols

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t put out any heat. Too many settings. Unclear remote/buttons
customer_reviews.author: FroShow

customer_reviews.title: Great heater! We LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: We use it in the garage and it works great! Very very easy to hang. Best part is not having to run back and forth to the store for propane. Just plug in and your good to go!
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend the Trusttech Heater
customer_reviews.text: I love the heat output and how fast it heats up the area. Having the remote is just an addition to convenience this heater provides. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: NIK S

customer_reviews.title: This product is great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. This product does what it guarantees. I liked that the delivery of this product was on time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McBride

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and fully functional
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in our garage. There is not heater in my garage, So, I can work on my car and stay warm in the winter time. It was very easy to install and use. so far so good. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sam C. Chong

customer_reviews.title: A lot of heat
customer_reviews.text: This unit is smaller than I expected, but for its size it puts out a lot of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Garage heater
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my garage and it does an ok job at heating it especially for how small it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great heater!
customer_reviews.text: Great patio heater! Easily adjusted with included remote. Very compact and very good heating for my screened in patio.
customer_reviews.author: colbysunday

product_meta.title: Patio Heater - Outdoor Heater w/3s-Fast Heating & Remote Control, Electric Patio Heater w/24H Timer Auto Shut Off, Super Quiet Wall-Mounted Space Heater for Large Room, Garage, Backyard, Office, 1500W
feature_bullets: 【3S FAST HEATING】- TRUSTECH Patio Heater, adopting the most advanced infrared technology, can give you instant warmth in only 3 SECONDS. This outdoor heater for patio, different with like products, is energy-saving & environment-friendly, will save up to 50% energy consumption.

【OVERHEAT PROTECTION】- TRUSTECH electric heaters for large room can detect temperature by itself and keep warmth at a comfortable level. If the temperature is excessive high, the wall heaters will shut off automatically, while if the temperature is lower than set value, it will start work again quietly. Putting it on the bedroom can ensure you have a warm sleep every night in winter.

【APPLICABLE TO INDOOR & OUTDOOR】- TRUSTECH Outdoor infrared heater is tailored for both indoor and outdoor places. As high as 1500W operating power and wall mounted design make it a perfect heating solution for areas such as patio, bedroom, living room, garage, office and even public place like restaurant. This infrared heater will defend coldness and bring warmth no matter you are staying at home, working or dinning with friends.

【EASY TO OPERATE & REMOTE CONTROL】- TRUSTECH wall mounted heater is easy to set up or relocate. With a remote control and LCD display, you can know the temperature at a simple glance, and change the temperature, set the timer from 1 to 24 hours, or turn patio heater on/off by a button press.

【QUIET, DURABLE & RELIABLE】- This space heater is working silently. It will not disturb you while you are sleeping or napping. Made by aluminium alloy, the outdoor heater is solid enough to bear accidental collision. Our outdoor patio heater are manufactured under strict quality standards and pass ETL certificate. Please feel free to drop an email through Amazon buyer message, if you meet any problems.
